data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Pomeroon-Supenaam, Guyana, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pomeroon-Supenaam, Guyana
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Pomeroon-Supenaam, Guyana.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Pomeroon-Supenaam access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who are far from you in Pomeroon-Supenaam. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 7,370 believers in the state of Pomeroon-Supenaam with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Pomeroon-Supenaam, Guyana who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary:
the state of Pomeroon-Supenaam, Guyana has a population of 46,900.

We estimate Pomeroon-Supenaam has 7,370 people who might know Jesus, 16,754 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 22,776 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 48.56 percent of the people of Pomeroon-Supenaam are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
